group_1.narration: "If we can't bring enough customers to the store@in time for Valentine's this year, then..."
"Sugar Plum will just have to close up shop."
"That being said, Sumomo...@It seems like it'll be a bit difficult for us to find@another job in this city."
"Because of that, we'll need to pack up@and start getting ready to move out of here..."
'It, it's not like anyone said@we have to give up and quit yet!'
"We'll give it our very best, right to the end.@Exactly like we promised your mom at her grave."

group_1.textCenter: (Lots and lots of customers@flocking into Dad's shop...)
(But...no matter how hard Dad works@and gives it his all...)
(If customers won't come in,@then the shop can't stay in business...)
(If we end up moving someplace else...)
(I'll have to say goodbye to Big Sis Kyoko@and the others, huh...)
(Even though we got to be really good friends...)

group_1.textRight: This shop doesn't seem to be in@very good shape as it stands, though.
With your wish, becoming the #1 most popular@shop in town will no longer be just a dream either.
(Eh, what...?@Where is this?)
(This place...that monster!)
(Help me...Big Sis Kyoko!)

group_1.textCenter: [chara:200652:motion_103]Welp, guess I'll pay 'em a visit today too...@[chara:200652:lipSynch_0][wait:1.75][chara:200652:lipSynch_1][chara:200652:motion_1]to Sugar Plum!
I should probably visit them once@I've got the rest of the gang in tow...
If that's how it is, I think Sumomo@will be pretty happy too, right?
(This magic...it's the Witch that@turned tail the other day!)
(Sumomo's shop is over in that direction too...@I've got a bad feeling about this.)
(Its presence is getting closer...@The Labyrinth should be right around here...)

group_1.textLeft: Eh...hm?
Ah, are you chasing after the Witch too,@or something?

group_1.textRight: No...I, uh...@I was keeping track of Kyubey's movements.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
It seemed like he was waiting for a good moment@to make contact with Miss Sumomo...

group_1.textLeft: That scumbag...@He still hasn't given up, huh?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...and for the Witch's presence to@reappear so suddenly on top of that...

group_1.textLeft: Then, Sumomo got sucked in...?!

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure, but...from this distance, the@chance of getting caught in it is quite likely.
...This might be the moment@that Kyubey was aiming for...

group_1.textLeft: Mm...what are you trying to say?
You mean...he was waiting for the moment@the Witch caught her and put her in danger...
...to try and force a contract out of her?!
No, there's just no way,@something that demonic and underhanded...

group_1.textRight: ...He'd do it.@That's just the sort of creatures they are.

group_1.textLeft: (Quick with the retort... I guess she must@have a reason to say that so assertively.)
Well we don't have the time to be fooling around,@let's dive on into the Labyrinth!

group_1.textRight: R...[chara:200351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:200351:lipSynch_1]Right!

group_1.textLeft: I can't get a good reading.@We should try going deeper into the heart.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, let's hurry...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200600:lipSynch_0][chara:200600:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...?![wait:1.3][chara:200600:lipSynch_1]@Hey, just now...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's the Witch's presence.@Someone's...[chara:200300:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:200300:lipSynch_1]being attacked.

group_1.textLeft: Shit, it's too far away!@I can't get over there in time!

group_1.textRight: ...Kyoko.@Can you grab on to me for a moment?

group_1.textLeft: Gh!

group_1.textRight: Hurry and make a contract with me!
That way, I can turn you into a Magical Girl!

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey, I'm sorry!@I can't do that!
I made a promise to Big Sis Kyoko!

group_1.textRight: Wait all you want, no one's coming to save you.
If you don't become a Magical Girl here and now,@that Witch will end your life.
You want your wish to come true@while you're still alive, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: But...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:3001_chara_damage]Gyaah?!
Ah, the Witch...!
Sorry for the holdup, Sumomo.@I put you in a pretty dangerous spot, there...

group_1.textLeft: Big Sis Kyoko?!

group_1.textRight: Miss Sumomo, are you alright?!@Were you injured?!
Kyoko, and Homura...@Where on Earth did you come from?
Until just now, there was no trace@of your presence to be felt here.
This is your time-stopping power, huh... Thanks a@million, it's because of you that we made it in time.
Take care of Sumomo.@Leave this Witch to me.

group_1.textLeft: Okay...thankfully, her injuries@don't look too serious.

group_1.textRight: Don't think you're gonna get away with@hurting my cute little sister figure!
You piece of trash...@I'll kill you!
